title: Respite Care
shortDescription: Temporary relief care for family caregivers of individuals with autism.
description: Respite care provides temporary relief for family caregivers by offering short-term care for individuals with autism. Trained respite workers can provide care in the family home, at a respite facility, or in the community. This allows parents and caregivers to rest, attend to other responsibilities, or simply take a break while knowing their loved one is in capable hands. Respite care is essential for preventing caregiver burnout and maintaining family well-being.
benefits: Allows time for siblings and other family needs
Can be scheduled regularly or for emergencies
